description: Generate text using Anthropic's Messages API and models.

max_tokens.info: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Set to 0 for unlimited tokens.

temperature.info: Run inference with this temperature. Must be in the closed interval [0.0, 1.0].

base_url.info: Endpoint of the Anthropic API. Defaults to 'https://api.anthropic.com' if not specified.

tool_model_enabled.info: Select if you want to use models that can work with tools. If yes, only those models will be shown.

warnings.tool_check_failed: Failed to check tool support for model '{model}': {error}

errors.langchain_anthropic_not_installed: langchain_anthropic is not installed. Please install it with `pip install langchain_anthropic`.
errors.connection_failed: Could not connect to Anthropic API.

logs.anthropic_not_available: Anthropic error module not available for exception handling
